EmailTemplate.description: Email Announcing Dow Corning's expanded distribution agreement with Univar USA.
EmailTemplate.name: Dow Corning Announcement
EmailTemplate.subject: Univar and Dow Corning have teamed up to handle all your silicone needs!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Univar Has Expanded Distribution Agreement with Dow Corning
<!-- -->
{!Contact.FirstName},
You may know that Univar is the largest chemical distributor in North America. We carry hundreds of products for every industry and market, including
amines, surfactants, acids, hydrocarbons, inorganics and many more.
But did you know that Univar now carries Dow Corning anti-foams, defoamers and other silicone products? If you have a silicone need, we have a solution.
To learn more, call me at {!User.MobilePhone}. Iâ€™ll be happy to answer any questions you have about our new line of Dow Corning silicones.
Sincerely,
{!User.Name}
{!User.Title}
Univar USA Inc.
